content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Extraction System at Position(-3.5, 27.5)
Consists of:
– Extraction system burner inserter at Position(-3.5, 27.5) with drop position Position(-3.5, 28.5)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position(2.5, 17.5)
Consists of:
– Cable factory input chest at Position(2.5, 17.5)
– New factory burner inserter (retrieved) at Position(2.5, 16.5)
– Dedicated factory burner inserter (placed using direction RIGHT) at Position(3.5, 17.5)

### Belt Depot at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
– Wooden chest (serving as belt depot) at Position(3.5, 15.5)
– Transport belt segment placed adjacent at Position(4.5, 15.5)
– Depot burner inserter (using direction UP) at Position(3.5, 14.5)

ERROR TIPS
────────────
– Transport Belt Connection Error:
  • When connecting transport belts, ensure that the target entity is not a Prototype.SteamEngine. Always add an inserter (or another valid input entity) as the target to properly accept items.

– Wooden Chest Placement Errors:
  • Verify that the target position is within the maximum allowed placement distance. If the distance exceeds limits, move the player closer before attempting placement.
  • Confirm that the required item (e.g. wooden chest) is present in the inventory before placing it.

– Undefined Variable Error:
  • Ensure all variables (such as target_chest) are defined and spelled consistently to avoid NameError exceptions.
